item.title: Remind Words: Tagesablauf
item.description: Remind Words Topic: Tagesablauf Today we are playing a small game which shall help you get familiar with german vocabulary in the topic: Tagesablauf. The game works as follows: We present german wordsand english translations. You have to build a story by putting the english words in an order. At the same time you get familiar with the german meaning. Afterwards you will be asked to rebuild the same story using the german words.
